title: Who were the democratic presidents? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Andrew Jackson - 1829–1837 Martin Van Buren - 1837–1841 James K. Polk - 1845–1849 Franklin Pierce - 1853–1857 James Buchanan - 1857–1861 Andrew Johnson -1865–1869 Grover Cleveland - 1885–1889, 1893–1897 Woodrow Wilson 1913–1921 Franklin D. Roosevelt - 1933–1945 Harry S. Truman - 1945–1953 John F. Kennedy - 1961–1963 Lyndon B. Johnson - 1963–1969 Jimmy Carter 1977–1981 Bill Clinton 1993–2001 Barack Obama 2009–2017

All of them prior to Trump with the possible exception of GWB. There is also a list of Presidents who belonged to the Democratic Party. That would be capitalized. Jefferson Madison Monroe JQ Adams Jackson Van Buren Tyler Polk Pierce Buvchanan Andrew Johnson Cleveland Wilson Roosevelt Truman JFK LBJ Carter Clinton Obama
